biotools.summary: Identify C. elegans piRNA-targeting sites within a given mRNA or spliced DNA sequence. Allows C. elegans researchers to predict piRNA targeting sites and to avoid the persistent germline silencing of transgenes that has rendered many constructs unusable.

bioschemas.name: pirScan
bioschemas.summary: Identify C. elegans piRNA-targeting sites within a given mRNA or spliced DNA sequence. Allows C. elegans researchers to predict piRNA targeting sites and to avoid the persistent germline silencing of transgenes that has rendered many constructs unusable.
